name: ISO 19005-3. Document management - Electronic document file format for long-term preservation - Part 3: Use of ISO 32000-1 with support for embedded files (PDF/A-3)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">pdf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A constrained form of Adobe PDF version 1.7 (as defined in ISO 32000-1)intended to be suitable for archiving page-oriented documents for which PDF is already being used in practice.  This version of PDF/A also allows files in any other format to be embedded.
